item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: Yep, funny the first dozen times. But like most things internet related, it leaves it's home base (WoW) and continues to fester in other places. Last night, I was playing <a href="http://www.dayofdefeat.com/" rel="nofollow">Day of Defeat</a> to ease the stress of everything that's been going on the past two week and who do I see on the server other than good ole Leeroy. When you find the Leeroy plague invading other games, you know it's time to for it to die. But it never will. It will just continue to fester. You'll be sitting on your deathbed in the hospital 60 years from now and the doctor will come into the room shouting "Leeeeeroooooy!". Just pull the plug now.
item.content:encoded: Yep, funny the first dozen times. But like most things internet related, it leaves it’s home base (WoW) and continues to fester in other places. Last night, I was playing Day of Defeat to ease the stress of everything that’s been going on the past two week and who do I see on the server other than good ole Leeroy. When you find the Leeroy plague invading other games, you know it’s time to for it to die. But it never will. It will just continue to fester. You’ll be sitting on your deathbed in the hospital 60 years from now and the doctor will come into the room shouting “Leeeeeroooooy!”. Just pull the plug now.
